description: An elegant restaurant with a warm atmosphere embellished by a central fireplace. Chef Marco Moretto creates modern dishes which are elegant and balanced, with a focus on seasonal produce from the region and elsewhere – in this region of lakes, just a stone’s throw from Switzerland, you’ll be surprised by the fragrant seafood specialities which feature on the menu alongside freshwater fish dishes.
